content: for round 1 of chart b k1b join in either c or d as a contrast heel you can 6 times 60 sts choose to work both heels in the same colour or rnds 2 7 as for round 1 following each round of chart b alternate colours using c or d work heel flap as follows 64 sts set up row k22 24 26 28 30 32 34 36 sts turn round 1 * work 9 sts as given for round 1 of chart b k2b next row sl1 p to end turn twice work 9 sts as given for round 1 of chart b k1b row 1 sl1 k1 to end turn repeat from * once more 64 sts row 2 sl1 p to end turn rnds 2 7 as for round 1 following each round of chart b repeat row 1 and 2 until heel measures 5 5 5 5 5 5 6 5 7 5 cm 2 2 2 2 2 2 2½ 3 in 68 sts or desired length finishing on row 1 round 1 *k1b work 9 sts as given for round 1 of chart b k2b 3 times repeat from * once more 68 sts turn heel rnds 2 7 as for round 1 following each round of chart b row 1 sl1 p12 13 14 15 16 17 18 19 p2tog p1 turn row 2 sl1 k5 ssk k1 turn 72 sts row 3 sl1 p6 p2tog p1 turn round 1 k1b work 9 sts as given for round 1 of chart b row 4 sl1 k7 ssk k1 turn k3b 5 times work 9 sts as given for round 1 of chart b cont in this way adding one stitch between slip k2b 72 sts stitch and ssk or p2tog on each row ie row 5 sl1 rnds 2 7 as for round 1 following each round of chart b p8 p2tog p1 turn row 6 sl1 k9 ssk k1 turn etc until all of the heel sts are used depending on how many sts are in your heel flap you may find that the all sizes k1 and p1 stitch is not required at the end of the last break off d 2 row using b knit 3 rnds knit across heel sts if required to bring you to the break off b left-hand side of the heel flap with the outside of using a knit each round until sock measures the flap facing you ready to pick up 1 stitch for every 13 13 14 14 15 15 17 17 cm 5¼ 5¼ 5½ 5½ 6 6 7 7 in 2 row of heel flap knitted remember that if you from cast on edge or length preferred don t worry if made the heel flap bigger you will need to pick up you don t exactly reach the end of the colour by the more stitches once you have picked up the stitches end of your last round place
